General.Name: Petrochemical
General.Description: Israel Petrochemical Enterprises Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the petrochemicals industry worldwide. The company provides various petroleum products, such as gasoline, naphtha, diesel, kerosene, fuel oil, LPG, and bitumen. In addition, the company produces raw materials for the plastic industry, such as polypropylene and polyethylene; and aromatic material for chemical and petrochemical industry. Further, it provides basic oils and waxes, as well as leases tankers to transport fuel products. The company serves fuel and gas marketing companies and gas stations. It sells its products through agents and distributors. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel. Israel Petrochemical Enterprises Ltd. is a subsidiary of Alverstone Ltd.
